title: Royal Australian Army Service Corps
creator_credit: Department of Army, Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: Shows the work of the Service Corps, which ranges from the cold stores of Victoria to the Malaya jungle. Presents interesting features such as air-drops in Malaya and the provisioning of Antarctic bases, using landing craft.
